task: Show the word count of the note content and print the current note.
solution: First, show the word count by selecting 'Show the word count of the note content', and then print the note by selecting 'Print the current note'.

task: Set the app to show the keyboard at startup and enable the use of an incognito mode keyboard for typing note content.

task: Rename the current note to 'Project Plan', enable monospaced font, and then create a shortcut for this note.
solution: Rename the note by selecting 'Rename the current note to "Project Plan"', use a monospaced font by selecting 'Use monospaced font for the note content', and finally, create a shortcut by selecting 'Create a shortcut for the current note on the home screen'.

task: Set the cursor to automatically position at the end of a note and delete the selected note
solution: First, set the cursor position by selecting 'Set the cursor to automatically position at the end of a note', then delete the selected note by selecting 'Delete the selected note'.
